item.name: HeroQuest: Nieuwe Editie
item.conditiontext:
Dutch version: HEROQUEST - NIEUWE EDITIE
Very good condition for game this old. Almost everything is there...
Misses: 1 door stand, 1 open door, 2 rock debris counters. The weapons of the henchmen are glued to the miniatures, but this shouldn't be a problem (3x crossbow, 3x halberd, 3x long sword, 3x short sword and shield). No extra henchmen weapons and a few miniatures (all heroes and 1 mummy) have paint on them... Nothing that will affect play!!
For sale it the price is right!
